fn.p: Citation Wang G, Jiang L, Wang J, Zhang J, Kong F, Li Q, Yan Y, Huang S, Zhao Y, Liang L, Li J, Sun N, Hu Y, Shi W, Deng G, Chen P, Liu L, Zeng X, Tian G, Bu Z, Chen H, Li C. 2020. The G protein-coupled receptor FFAR2 promotes internalization during influenza A virus entry. J Virol 94:e01707-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.01707-19.
